DataElement.preferredName: Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act Authorization Day Count
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the number of days since Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act (HIPAA) authorization was obtained.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act Authorization
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information relating to a Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act (HIPAA) authorization.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Public Law 104-91, enacted in 1996, is designed to protect health insurance coverage for workers and their families when they change or lose their jobs. HIPAA has separate provisions for the large and small group markets, and the individual market. HIPAA amends the Employee Retirement Income Security Act (ERISA), the Public Health Service Act, and the Internal Revenue Code to provide improved portability and continuity of health insurance coverage, extending earlier provisions under the Consolidated Omnibus Budget Reconciliation Act of 1985 ("COBRA").

Concepts.longName: Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act
Concepts.definition: United States legislation enacted in 1996 that aims to provide health data privacy and security.

Property.preferredDefinition: Decision of the competent authorities in form of a letter, document, or verbal or electronic form, that confirms that somebody has permission to do something or be somewhere, e.g. to realize a given project.

Concepts.definition: Decision of the competent authorities in form of a letter, document, or verbal or electronic form, that confirms that somebody has permission to do something or be somewhere, e.g. to realize a given project.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the management of a research protocol and its case report forms.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours.:To determine the number or amount of something; the result of this activity.

Concepts.definition: The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day.
Determining the number or amount of something.
